about.heading: Data Scientist | Problem Solver | Lifelong Learner
about.description: I'm a Data Scientist with a passion for uncovering insights and building intelligent systems that drive real impact. Based in Ottawa, I specialize in machine learning, natural language processing, and currently, I’m diving deep into the mechanics of Large Language Models—building one from scratch to truly understand how they work. My experience blends practical analytics with a hands-on approach to model development, including crafting tools that streamline processes and enhance decision-making. Whether it's developing robust ML pipelines or experimenting with cutting-edge AI.
